parties: CSAC EXCESS INSURANCE AUTHORITY, Objector v. RELIANCE INSURANCE COMPANY IN LIQUIDATION (Ancillary Matter to in re Reliance Insurance Company in Liquidation, No. 1 Rel 2001). Appeal of CSAC Excess Insurance Authority, Objector.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of October, 2013, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
